name: Deadly Jurassic Survival
description:
Deadly Jurassic Survival is the most thrilling and unique safari hunting game and start hunting of jungle dino where you will meet face to face with dino which attack. In FPS hunting has many dino to hunt. You must utilize army lone Survival skills for shooting to survive and fight against wild animals and find escape from dino. Has variety of hunting weapons like shotguns, pistols, assault rifles and also many other sniper shooting guns and archers are available to hunt down dino dangerous. Accuracy is the key factor in hunting simulation game, so be accurate while taking the killer head shots and don’t miss a single bullet shot or else the deadly beasts will kill you. Use all the possible tools and weapons to defend yourself from dino.
Features:
- Real dino hunting.
- Best hunting simulator 3D
- Realistic FPS shooting with guns effects, Real jungle animations and sounds effects
- Eye catching environment
- Realistic animated animals to be hunted.
- Smooth and simple game control.
